0:
mqtt:
  host: emqx.home.svc.cluster.local
  username: "${DT_MQTT_USERNAME}"
  password: "${DT_MQTT_PASSWORD}"

frigate:
  url: http://frigate.home.svc.cluster.local:5000
  cameras:
    - amcrest-frontyard
    - amcrest-pool
    - amcrest-turret
    - amcrest-office

  zones:
    - camera: amcrest-frontyard
      zone: outside
    - camera: amcrest-pool
      zone: outside
    - camera: amcrest-turret
      zone: familyroom
    - camera: amcrest-office
      zone: office

  events:

detect:
  match:
    save: true
  unknown:
    save: true

detectors:
  deepstack:
    enabled: true
    url: "http://deepstack.home.svc.cluster.local:5000"
  compreface:
    enabled: false

time:
  timezone: America/New_York

notify:
until nc -vz postgres16-rw.databases.svc.cluster.local 5432; do echo "Waiting for postgres..."; sleep 3; done;
